description: Spacious and modern 1-bedroom in the heart of Williamsburg, steps away from restaurants bars cafes shops and street fairs.
name: Luxury 1 bedroom in heart of Williamsburg
review: We had a great stay!! MJ was an accommodating and responsive host.  The apartment was in a perfect location, close to many great restaurants and shops.  The apartment was clean and new, and we would definitely recommend staying here.
